home_actions: Supervised tummy time and short daily practice
clinic_trigger: No improvement or persistent asymmetry by expected window

biology_explanation: Auditory pathways and social attention integrate
observable_signs: Responds to name and uses simple sounds
normal_variation: Rate of early word emergence differs
home_actions: Read aloud and repeat simple labels daily
clinic_trigger: No response to sound or no communicative attempts over time

development_process: Early peer awareness and imitation increase
biology_explanation: Executive control and emotional regulation pathways mature
observable_signs: Watches peers and imitates simple routines
normal_variation: Some children warm slowly in groups
home_actions: Use short shared-play routines and model turn-taking
clinic_trigger: Persistent social disengagement or skill regression

biology_explanation: Network integration supports planning and memory
observable_signs: Uses pretend scenarios and simple problem solving
normal_variation: Complexity varies by temperament and exposure
home_actions: Offer guided pretend play and narrative routines
clinic_trigger: Loss of prior problem-solving ability or sustained plateau
